DOC.brief_title: Locally Delivered Atorvastatin & Rosuvastatin Treatment Furcation Defects Chronic Periodontitis
DOC.detailed_description: Statins one lipid lower drug help reduce cholesterol level body specifically inhibit 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase ; rate limit enzyme cholesterol synthesis . Rosuvastatin ( RSV ) atorvastatin ( ATV ) show bone stimulatory anti-inflammatory effects.. The present study aim explore efficacy 1.2 % RSV 1.2 % ATV gel local drug delivery redelivery system adjunct scale root planing ( SRP ) treatment degree II furcation defect . Methods : Ninety patient mandibular buccal class II furcation defect randomly allocate three treatment group : SRP plus placebo gel ( group 1 ) , SRP plus 1.2 % RSV gel ( group 2 ) 1.2 % ATV gel ( group3 ) . Clinical radiographic parameter record baseline 6 month . The gel redelivered respective site 6 month appointment . Then clinical radiographic parameter record 3 month . ( 9 month baseline )
